$:/_sq/Stories/config/snippets/viewswitc.text:
\define icon() $:/core/images/storyview-$(storyview)$ \end <$linkcatcher to="$:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview">
<$list filter="[storyviews[]]" variable="storyview"> <$set name="cls" filter="[prefix{$:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview}]" value="tc-chooser-item tc-chosen" emptyValue="tc-chooser-item">
>> <$link to=<>> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$text text=<>/>
$:/_sq/Stories/config/snippets/viewswitc.title: $:/_sq/Stories/config/snippets/viewswitcher

$:/_sq/Stories/CorePatch/ButtonDispatchM.title: $:/_sq/Stories/CorePatch/ButtonDispatchMessage

$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerEditMacro.text: \define divertTiddlerButton() <$set name="original" value={{!!draft.title}}> <$set name="otherStoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$button class=<> tooltip="Divert this tiddler to the other story for viewing"> <$reveal state="$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert" type="nomatch" text="top" default="top"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="[]"/> <$reveal state="$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert" type="match" text="top" default="top"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[prepend]"/> {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-right.svg}}{{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-left.svg}} \end <>
$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerEditMacro.title: $:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerEditMacro
$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerEditMacro.caption: {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-right.svg}}

$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerMacro.text: \define __me() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] \end \define divertTiddlerButton() <$set name="activeStoryList" value=<> > <$set name="otherStoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$set name="otherHistoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/HistoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$button class=<> tooltip="Divert this tiddler to the other story"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove<__me>]"/> <$reveal state="$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert" type="nomatch" text="top" default="top"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter=<<__me>>/> <$reveal state="$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert" type="match" text="top" default="top"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[prepend<__me>]"/> <$action-addtohistory $history=<> $title=<> /> {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-right.svg}}{{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-left.svg}} \end <>
$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerMacro.title: $:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerMacro
$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerMacro.caption: {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-right.svg}} divert left/right

$:/_sq/Stories/EditTiddlerHook.title: $:/_sq/Stories/EditTiddlerHook

$:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars-empty.svg.text: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" x="0px" y="0px" class="tc-image-bars-empty tc-image-button" width="40pt" height="40pt"><title>Single fold</title><desc>Created with Sketch.</desc><g stroke="none" stroke-width="1" fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd"><g stroke="#000000"><rect stroke-width="2" x="17" y="17" width="66" height="66" rx="2"/><path d="M50.5,18.5 L50.5,80.789646" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="2,3,2,3"/></g></g></svg>
$:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars-empty.svg.title: $:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars-empty.svg

$:/_sq/Stories/LinkKeybindings.title: $:/_sq/Stories/LinkKeybindings

$:/_sq/Stories/Stories.css.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Stories.css

$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/RiverDropZone.text:
\define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> \end <$reveal state="$:/_sq/Stories/config/showRiverDropZones" text="enable" type="match" default="disable">
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-tiddler"/>
<$set name="otherStoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$droppable actions=<>>
 
Drop link here to open
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/RiverDropZone.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/RiverDropZone

$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/Story2Template.text:
\whitespace trim <$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="match" text="yes" default="no" retain="yes" animate="no" tag="section" class="tc-story-river tc-storytwo-river sq-story-rivertwo"> <$navigator story="$:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList" history="$:/_sq/Stories/Story2HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}> <$scrollable class="sq-story-rivertwo-scrollable" fallthrough="no">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/AboveStory]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/>
<$list filter="[list[$:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList]]" history="$:/_sq/Stories/Story2HistoryList" template="$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate" editTemplate="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate" storyview={{$:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview}}>
<$transclude/>
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/BelowStory]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/>
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/Story2Template.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/Story2Template

$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu.text:
<$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="nomatch" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="no" tooltip="Hide right column" aria-label="" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-storytwotoggle">{{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars-empty.svg}} Hide right column
<$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="match" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="yes" tooltip="Show right column" aria-label="" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-storytwotoggle tc-btn-storytwotoggle-bars">{{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars.svg}} Show right column
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu

$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePage.text: <$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="nomatch" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="no" tooltip="Hide right column" aria-label="" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-storytwotoggle">{{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars-empty.svg}} <$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="match" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="yes" tooltip="Show right column" aria-label="" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-storytwotoggle">{{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars.svg}}
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePage.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePageControl
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePage.description: Show right column for second story
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePage.caption: {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/bars.svg}} Show right column

$:/_sq/Stories/Story2HistoryList.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Story2HistoryList

$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open.text:
\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/ \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<<_otherStory>> $subfilter="-[]"/> \end \define placeholder()
\end \define droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<>> <>
$button$
\end \define open-tiddler-list()
<$list filter="[list]" history=<> storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button message="tm-close-tiddler" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$link to={{!!title}}><$view field="title"/>"""/>
<$tiddler tiddler="">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button message="tm-close-all-tiddlers" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"><>"""/>
\end ''Left Column'' <$set name="_otherStory" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <>
--- ''Right Column'' <$set name="_otherStory" value=<> > <$set name="tv-story-list" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$set name="tv-history-list" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/HistoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$navigator story=<> history=<> > <>
--- <$transclude tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu"/>
$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open.title: $:/core/ui/SideBar/Open
$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open.caption: {{$:/language/SideBar/Open/Caption}}

$:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings.text:
|[[Minimum width to show the second story|$:/_sq/Stories/config/twostorybreakpoint]] |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/config/twostorybreakpoint" default="" tag="input"/> |
|[[Minimum width to show non-overlapping sidebar|$:/_sq/Stories/config/sidebaroverlaybreakpoint]] |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/config/sidebaroverlaybreakpoint" default="" tag="input"/> |
|[[Open tiddlers at top or bottom of story when using divert button|$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert]] | <$select tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert" default="top"><option value="top">top</option><option value="bottom">bottom</option></$select>|
|<$link to="$:/_sq/Stories/config/showRiverDropZones">Show dropzones above each story</$link>|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/config/showRiverDropZones" field="text" checked="enable" unchecked="disable" default="disable"></$checkbox>|
|[[Story view for second story|$:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview]]:|{{$:/_sq/Stories/config/snippets/viewswitcher}}|
$:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings.title: $:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings
$:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings.caption: Two Story Layout
